dataset.title: Primary, Secondary, and Tertiary Prevention Methods

instruction.instructionnorm: To complete the activity, select each item and then select the corresponding category. Replay this interaction as many times as you need. There is no time limit. Your responses will not be graded.

draggableitem.item: Early disease detection through health screenings and regular exams
